item.title: Household device power wattage
item.description: Task was to extract data from an html table of power wattage by devices and sort the table. Reference Data from DaftLogic Table 1: Household devices by wattage Appliance Minimum Maximum Standby Power Shower 7500 10500 0 Electric Tankless Water Heater 6600 8800 NA Electric Boiler 4000 14000 NA Hand Wash Oversink Water Heater 3000 3000 NA Hot Water Immersion Heater 3000 3000 NA Evaporative Air Conditioner 2600 2600 NA Corded Electric Handheld Leaf Blower 2500 2500 NA Steam Iron 2200 2500 NA Oven 2150 2150 NA Electric Heater Fan 2000 3000 NA Electric stove 2000 2000 NA Space Heater 2000 5000 NA Hair Blow Dryer 1800 2500 NA EV Home Charger 1600 3400 NA Air Fryer 1500 1500 NA Electric Mower 1500 1500 NA Induction Hob (per hob) 1400 1800 NA Espresso Coffee Machine 1300 1500 NA Inverter Air conditioner 1300 1800 NA 9"
